version_description:
Various graphic updates and improvements
Various fixes to controller and focus navigation
Updates to tutorial park
Fixed sometimes incorrect board sounds
Show correct message if opponent leaves or user disconnects
Updates to tricks and boards
Fixed typos

Modified various tricks to score per trick instead of time
Better multitouch handling
Various improvements to all parks

Update #33 and counting. We now have added the ability to provide Test boards for you. Every now and then you have the ability to test all the awesome boards for a limited time.
Additionally touch and performance related issued have been fixed. Furthermore, distorted screen on devices running iOS 8 has been fixed.
